home.title: Create and generate multiple QR codes online
home.description: Qr code generator is a service for generating QR codes with the option to add your own unique label. Supports bulk creation of multiple codes at once.

meta.title: QR Code Generator — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: Generate single or multiple QR codes online. Supports up to 50 QR codes at once for events and campaigns.
meta.keywords: QR code generator, bulk QR codes, create QR code, qr-code-generator.site

contactUs.title: Contact Us — QR Code Generator User Support
contactUs.description: If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance — contact our team. We will respond as quickly as possible.
contactUs.agreement: You agree that your data will be used to process your request.

meta.title: Contact Us — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: Get in touch with qr-code-generator.site team for support, suggestions, or feedback.
meta.keywords: contact qr-code-generator.site, QR code generator support

about.intro: qr-code-generator is a convenient and functional application that helps users create QR codes for different purposes. Our main advantage is the ability to generate multiple codes at once and add your own unique label.
about.registeredUsers: For registered users: access your QR generation history and saved projects. Registration is available directly in the app.

features.bulkGeneration: Bulk generation: create multiple QR codes at once.
features.customLabel: Custom labels: add your own text or logo to each code.
features.infoSearch: Information encoding: generate QR codes for links, Wi-Fi, business cards, and other data.
features.history: Generation history: view previously created QR codes and reuse them.

meta.title: About — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: qr-code-generator.site is a free service for creating single or bulk QR codes and decoding existing ones.
meta.keywords: about qr-code-generator.site, QR code generator info

support.title: Project Support
support.donation1: Donations are voluntary and not required for using the site. You may support the project, but this does not affect access to content or services.
support.donation2: Donations are used to maintain the application, improve the user experience, and promote content that is important for our audience.
support.paymentTitle: Payment via personal account through the E-POS service
support.paymentInstruction: To pay, the client needs to open their banking app, select: ERIP / E-POS service / and enter the account number: 30916-1-1
support.qrInstruction: Scan the QR code to make a payment

meta.title: Support — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: Donations help maintain and improve qr-code-generator.site. Thank you for your support!
meta.keywords: support qr-code-generator.site, donate QR code generator

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.law: In accordance with the Law of the Republic of Belarus of May 7, 2021 No. 99-З 'On Personal Data Protection', our application processes and stores data strictly in compliance with current legislation.

agreement.service: 1. Service description: The 'qr-code-generator' service allows users to create QR codes for different purposes. The application is not an official representative of any governmental or private organizations.
agreement.dataTransfer: 2. Data transfer: The service does not require registration and does not use cookies. The application does not collect or store personal user data. All information entered for QR code generation is used solely for that purpose and is not shared with third parties.
agreement.statistics: 3. Statistics collection: We use Umami only for gathering anonymized website traffic statistics. This data does not allow us to identify individual users.
agreement.responsibility: 4. Limitation of liability: The 'qr-code-generator' service is not responsible for incorrect use of QR codes by users or for possible malfunctions of third-party services.
agreement.intellectual: 5. Intellectual property: All rights to logos, names, and content that QR codes may link to belong to their respective owners. Our service does not copy or infringe on third-party intellectual property.
agreement.consent: 6. User consent: By using the application, the user agrees to this agreement and confirms that they understand all conditions and limitations.

meta.title: Privacy Policy — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: Learn how qr-code-generator.site processes and protects user data. No registration, no cookies.
meta.keywords: privacy policy qr-code-generator.site, QR code data protection

wifiCodeGenerator.title: Wi-Fi Code Generator
wifiCodeGenerator.description: A service for generating QR codes that let users quickly connect to a Wi-Fi network without entering the password manually.
wifiCodeGenerator.usageTitle: How to Use Wi-Fi Code Generator
usage: Enter the name of your Wi-Fi network (SSID).
Select the encryption type (WPA, WPA2, no password).
Generate the QR code and share it with others.
When scanned, the QR code will automatically connect the device to your Wi-Fi network.
wifiCodeGenerator.note: Your data is not stored or shared with third parties.

meta.title: Wi-Fi QR Code Generator — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: Generate QR codes for Wi-Fi connections. Share QR codes to let others connect instantly without typing passwords.
meta.keywords: Wi-Fi QR code, Wi-Fi login QR, qr-code-generator.site

linkCodeGenerator.title: Link Code Generator
linkCodeGenerator.description: A service for generating QR codes that contain links to websites, documents, or online pages.
linkCodeGenerator.noLinks: No data to generate QR codes.
linkCodeGenerator.noQRs: No QR codes available for download
linkCodeGenerator.usageTitle: How to use Link Code Generator
usage: Enter the URL address that the QR code should redirect to.
Optionally, add a description or a unique label.
Generate the QR code and download it in the required format.
Share the QR code in print or digital materials.
When scanned, the QR code will immediately redirect the user to the specified link.
linkCodeGenerator.note: The service does not verify the content of links. The user is responsible for their validity.

meta.title: Link QR Code Generator — qr-code-generator.site
meta.description: Generate QR codes from links, websites, and documents. Bulk generation up to 50 QR codes at once.
meta.keywords: link QR code, bulk QR code, qr-code-generator.site

QRCodeDecoder.title: QR Code Decoder
QRCodeDecoder.description: Upload an image with a QR code and get the decoded link.
QRCodeDecoder.note: Only PNG or JPG images are supported.

meta.title: QR Code Decoder — qr-code-generator
meta.description: Use qr-code-generator QR decoder to upload an image with a QR code and get the decoded link. Supports PNG and JPG.
meta.keywords: QR code, decoder, QR scan, qr-code-generator
